sn14.35:1.2: “Yo, bhikkhave, pathavīdhātuṁ abhinandati, dukkhaṁ so abhinandati.
sn14.35:1.3: Yo dukkhaṁ abhinandati, ‘aparimutto so dukkhasmā’ti vadāmi.
sn14.35:1.6: yo vāyodhātuṁ abhinandati, dukkhaṁ so abhinandati.
sn14.35:1.7: Yo dukkhaṁ abhinandati, ‘aparimutto so dukkhasmā’ti vadāmi.
sn14.35:2.1: Yo ca kho, bhikkhave, pathavīdhātuṁ nābhinandati, dukkhaṁ so nābhinandati.
sn14.35:2.2: Yo dukkhaṁ nābhinandati, ‘parimutto so dukkhasmā’ti vadāmi.
sn14.35:2.5: yo vāyodhātuṁ nābhinandati, dukkhaṁ so nābhinandati.
sn14.35:2.6: Yo dukkhaṁ nābhinandati, ‘parimutto so dukkhasmā’ti vadāmī”ti.
